description.brief: Physical power, endurance, and forceful presence
description.detailed: Strength embodies raw physical power, structural integrity, and the capacity to exert force on reality. High Strength increases carry capacity, melee damage, and the ability to wield heavy gear.
description.visual_manifestation: Blue force lines, shockwave aura, grounded stance

primary_effects: Increases physical damage and carrying capacity
Enhances gear load and heavy equipment usage
secondary_effects: Increases throwing force and lift thresholds
core_mechanics.soft_caps: Diminishing returns for carry capacity after 80

damage_type_integration.damage_synergy: Fire and force-based techniques scale with Strength
